document.full_text: eight militants and one member of the security forces were killed in clashes in the north caucasus republic of dagestan sunday, where russia is fighting a growing islamist insurgency, authorities said.
document.title: nine killed in clashes in russia's north caucasus
lines_and_colors: eight militants and one member of the security forces were killed in clashes in the north caucasus republic of dagestan sunday, where russia is fighting a growing islamist insurgency, authorities said.
